translated: Therefore, it is said that ‚Äúat no time.‚Äù

original: tsam pa de tsam du 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: tsam pa de tsam du 'dzin par byed do //
translated: At any time, one grasps just as much as one understands.üîΩWithout grasping it, the expression of the speaker and the expression of the

original: de ma bzung bar ni yid ches pa dang / der rung ba'i brjod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma bzung bar ni yid ches pa dang / der rung ba'i brjod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: object would not occur.üîΩWhen the speaker utters the sound, there are two intentions: the intention

original: smra ba po sgra rjod par byed pa na pha rol pas don gyi spyi tsam shes par bya'o snyam du rtog pa dang / bye brag shes par bya'o snyam du rtog pa'i bsam pa gnyis 'byung ste /
analyzed: smra ba po sgra rjod par byed pa na pha rol pas don gyi spyi tsam shes par bya'o snyam du rtog pa dang / bye brag shes par bya'o snyam du rtog pa'i bsam pa gnyis 'byung ste /
translated: to make the other understand the mere universal of the object, and the intention to make him understand the particular.

original: de gang byung ba des sgra de'i ming yang 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: de gang byung ba des sgra de'i ming yang 'dogs par byed de /
translated: And whatever occurs is also the name of that sound.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩspyi tsam khong du chud bya dang // khyad par khong du chud bya dag / smra ba'i bsam pa'ang gnyis su'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir / spyi tsam khong du chud bya dang // khyad par khong du chud bya dag / smra ba'i bsam pa'ang gnyis su'o //
translated: In order to demonstrate that, it says:üîΩThe intention of the speaker is twofold:

original: zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes smos pa yin no //
translated: to be understood in a general sense and to be understood in a specific sense.

original: da ni dgag pa'i sgra de dag kho na yin nam /
analyzed: da ni dgag pa'i sgra de dag kho na yin nam /
translated: Now, are those just the negating terms?üîΩOr are there more extensive ones?

original: 'on te de bas rgyas pa yang yod snyam du la la dag rtog pa srid pas /üîΩde'i phyir / ngo bo ston pa ji snyed pa //üîΩde dag dgag pa'ang de snyed kyi //
analyzed: 'on te de bas rgyas pa yang yod snyam du la la dag rtog pa srid pas / de'i phyir / ngo bo ston pa ji snyed pa // de dag dgag pa'ang de snyed kyi //
translated: Since it is possible that some may think this,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: it says:üîΩAs many as there are terms that indicate an entity,üîΩthere are that many negations.

original: ngo bo ston pa'i sgra ni dgag pa ma gtogs pa'i rjod pa thams cad yin te /
analyzed: ngo bo ston pa'i sgra ni dgag pa ma gtogs pa'i rjod pa thams cad yin te /
translated: The terms that indicate an entity are all the expressions except for negations,

original: thams cad kyang don gyi ngo bo nyid ston cing sgrub par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: thams cad kyang don gyi ngo bo nyid ston cing sgrub par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: because all of them indicate and establish the entity of the object.

original: de dag ji snyed pa de dag kun kyang de dgag pa'i sgra yis dgag tu rung ba can sha stag ste /
analyzed: de dag ji snyed pa de dag kun kyang de dgag pa'i sgra yis dgag tu rung ba can sha stag ste /
translated: As many as there are, all of them are suitable to be negated by the terms that negate them.

original: mi rung ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rung ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is not a single one that is not suitable.

original: dbye ba de ltar yod na yang bsdu na 'di dag tu 'dus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbye ba de ltar yod na yang bsdu na 'di dag tu 'dus pa'i phyir /
translated: Although there are that many divisions, they are included in these, if they are to be summarized.

original: 'on kyang mdo ru bsdu ba ni //
analyzed: 'on kyang mdo ru bsdu ba ni //
translated: However, the summary in the sutra

original: 'di dag tsam du shes par bya //
analyzed: 'di dag tsam du shes par bya //
translated: should be understood as just these.

original: zhes smos pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes smos pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: bsdu pa ni 'di dag tsam las lhag tu bstan du med de /
analyzed: bsdu pa ni 'di dag tsam las lhag tu bstan du med de /
translated: The summary is not taught to be more than just these,

original: 'ga' yang ma 'dus ba med do zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' yang ma 'dus ba med do zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: and there is nothing that is not included.

original: ldog pa bsdus bar bstan pa las rab tu gsal bar bstan pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: ldog pa bsdus bar bstan pa las rab tu gsal bar bstan pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
translated: This is the fourth chapter, the chapter on the explanation of the clear expression of the summary of the reversal.

original: // / ldog pa rab bstan blo dman don du bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: // / ldog pa rab bstan blo dman don du bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the clear expression of the reversal for the sake of those of lesser intelligence,

original: dpe gsal brjod dang nges thob gang yin dang // bsngo ba'i dge ba gang yin des ni bshes gnyen kun //
analyzed: dpe gsal brjod dang nges thob gang yin dang // bsngo ba'i dge ba gang yin des ni bshes gnyen kun //
translated: whatever is the clear expression of the example, the definite attainment, and the virtue of dedication, by that, may all the spiritual friends

original: dpal mgon 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs la gtug gyur cig /
analyzed: dpal mgon 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs la gtug gyur cig /
translated: bow at the feet of the glorious protector Manjushri.

original: // / ldog pa bsdus pa bstan pa'i rnam 'grel slob dpon na bi dha rm'as blo dman pa'i don ched du gsal tshig tu byas pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: // / ldog pa bsdus pa bstan pa'i rnam 'grel slob dpon na bi dha rm'as blo dman pa'i don ched du gsal tshig tu byas pa rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary on the summary of the reversal, composed in clear words for the sake of those of lesser intelligence by the master Nabhira, is complete.
